User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://coprra.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /private/

# Allow search engines to crawl important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /products
Allow: /blog
Allow: /compare
Allow: /login

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
